company_overview.Name: Shopify Inc. Class A Subordinate Voting Shares
company_overview.Description: Shopify Inc., a commerce company, offers a commerce and service platform in Canada, the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, Latin America, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Ottawa, Canada.
company_overview.Address: 151 O'CONNOR STREET, GROUND FLOOR, GROUND FLOOR, OTTAWA, ON, CA
